body.name: Extra Large Memory Seat Cushion for Office Chair Pressure Relief Sciatica & Tailbone Pain Relief Memory Foam Firm Coccyx Pad for Long Sitting, for Office Chair, Gaming Chair and Car Seat, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 58 mins
features: 🏅【Ergonomic Design for Superior Comfort】Our memory foam seat cushion is expertly crafted to enhance your posture and cradle your thighs and hips, providing unmatched comfort during long periods of sitting.
🏅【Transform Any Chair into a Personal Throne】Upgrade any ordinary seating into a luxurious experience with our soft hip and thigh cushioning, which eliminates back pains and numb legs.

🏅【Easy to Clean and Non-Slip】Our seat cushion comes with a removable and machine-washable cover, making it easy to maintain hygiene. The non-slip rubber bottom ensures optimal seat cushion position and prevents sliding for added security.
🏅【Relieve Lower Back Discomfort and Sciatica Pain】Our coccyx cushion aids in keeping a healthy spine alignment, providing all-day sitting comfort. It's also a great option for sciatica pain relief.

🏅【Versatile and Adaptable Design】Perfect for office chairs, cars, sofas, dining chairs, outdoor patio cushions, and even for use during travel and at sports venues. Experience unparalleled comfort wherever and whenever you need it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help relieve the severe pain I was getting in my lower back and hips from working at a desk everyday. This product helped to relieve pain the first day! I have already recommended to my colleagues who also suffer from this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so pleased with the thickness and quality of this product. I often have to sit at work and I was getting pain in my tailbone. I have tried other seat cushions but nothing helped relieve the pain I was feeling. I bought this seat hoping it would work and it does!! I no longer have the pain in my Tailbone. This has a nice rubber bottom to it so it does not slip and slide all over the seat. The memoryFoam hugs my bottom, giving great support! I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this product. I would recommend this seat over any other. Great product and great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cushion Seat On The Market
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item for work because I sit alot throughout the day. I was impressed when I first sit down instantly the comfort and how the cushion is format perfectly to provide support to your buttocks, lower back and hips not too mention the cutout design for your coccyx and sciatic nerve. I have made another purchase for my vehicle. I highly recommend this item it's 3-times better than the purple cushion plus cost less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband is a truck driver and it’s made a huge difference in his bottom and lower back pain! He can tell a big difference. The truck is still bouncy due to the roads. But it’s much more comfortable and smooth he says! Christmas present for the win!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too big for me and the kitchen chair.
reviews.reviewText: I homeschool and use a kitchen table as the school desk.I bought this cushion because I have a deteriorating SI joint and sitting for even a short time cause's me considerable pain.I bought this size cushion thinking that it probably was better to have the cushion a little too big than too small.Recently I have lost a good deal of weight but I still have more to loose so I figured extra large would probably be best choice. I wish I had not made that choice. (for reference I am 5'3" and 170lbs)-The area cutout to relieve pressure on the coccyx bone takes a lot of intentionality to make sure it alines with my coccyx bone.-The cushion is too large for the chair and constantly is sliding back under the back rest and sideways off one or the other side of the chair.-I figured the cushions curve at the back would keep it aligned with the matching back rest and stop it from sliding under. It did not.-I also figured the curve would add more pressure relief to the coccyx bone area while being more supportive over all. I think it does, it would just be a lot better if it was a smaller size for me.*The cushion does help with pain relief and prevention if everything lines up properly. I think I personally just need the smaller size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and this has saved me from having to buy another chair. I sit for long periods of time and this really helps to relieve pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Very firm, not thick enough padding. Starts hurting your rear after a short period of time< the hole in the rear for your tail bone too close together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too large for smaller woman and only one size extra large
reviews.reviewText: Too large and only somewhat comfortable
Expensive for what it is.Not enough paddingI find myself lower than my legs
